author: Christine Fisher
title: Alexa can tell you what to do if you think you have COVID-19
description: Amazon is joining Alphabet's Verily and Apple's Siri in offering a COVID-19 screening tool. If you're in the US, you can now ask your Alexa devices to assess your risk level for the disease, as well as what to do if you think you have COVID-19. Alexa will ask…
content: The service is also available in Japan, where Alexa provides Japanese Ministry of Health, Labor and Welfare guidance. And if you're in Australia, Brazil, Canada, France, India, the UK and the US, you can ask Alexa to sing a song for 20 seconds, as a way to ti… [+793 chars]
